title: Registration & Move In
body: New and returning students register. New day students recommended after 11:00 am. Parents may have coffee and chat with the Parent Committee in the Wrestling Room (adjacent to Hahn Room). Location: William Boyce Thompson Field House, Chadwick Lane.

title: Lunch
body: Students and families enjoy food, meet the Lion mascot, and listen to the DJ. Locations: Elm Street and New Dining Halls.

title: New Day Students & Families Meeting
body: Meet Jennifer Manx Asch, Day Student Coordinator, to learn about resources for day students. Location: Elizabeth Phillips Academy Center, Day Student Lounge, 2nd floor.

title: Adviser Meetings
body: New boarders and day students meet their advisers with families. Advisers will email meeting locations.

title: Dorm Meet and Greet for Families
body: New boarders and day students meet their dorm teams in dorm common rooms.

title: New Students Meet Proctors
body: Proctors meet new boarding and day students for introductions and a dormitory tour. Location: dorm common room.

title: Principal’s Welcome Assembly for New Parents
body: Principal Rawson and Academy leaders share insights about transitioning to Exeter. Location: Goel Center for Theater and Dance, Mainstage.

title: Parent/Guardian Welcome Reception
body: Reception with refreshments, beverages, and fellowship for parents/guardians. Hosted by the Family Engagement and Giving Office. Location: Thompson Field House, Chadwick Lane, Wrestling Room, 2nd floor.

title: Student/Advisory BBQ & Back to School Party
body: BBQ and party on McConnell Lawn. Advisers will communicate meet-up locations.

title: Academy Basics - Preps & Lowers
body: Preps (Grainger) & Lowers (Love Gym) meet with the Dean of Students Office. Required.

title: Academy Basics - Uppers & Seniors
body: Uppers (Grainger) & Seniors (Love Gym) meet with the Dean of Students Office. Required.

title: Required Dorm Meetings
body: Required dorm meetings for all boarders and dorm affiliates. Optional for day student affiliates.

title: Dining notes
body: New Dining Hall is closed for Preseason.

title: Preseason check-in
body: Check-in is at 9:30 for all students every day during Preseason.
